post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Oracle's First Free Database

As an entry-level database with a small footprint, Oracle Database XE (Express Edition) is fast to download, easy to install, and best of all, free.

Built on the same code base as Oracle Database 10g Release 2, Oracle Database XE is an ideal database for:

* Developers working on PHP, Java, .NET, database, and open-source applications

* Independent software vendors (ISVs) and hardware vendors who want a database to distribute free of charge

* DBAs who need a free, starter database for training and deployment

With Oracle Database XE, you can develop and deploy on Oracle from the very beginning, using our proven, industry-leading infrastructure.

http://www.oracle.com/technology/products/database/xe/index.html
post.title: Free - Oracle Database 10g Express Edition
